text: Andrew George 'Red' SpoonerFind A Grave, Andrew George 'Red' Spooner (1910-1984) (August 24, 1910 — May 7, 1984) was a Canadian professional ice hockey goaltender who played in one National Hockey League game for the Pittsburgh Pirates during the 1929–30 NHL season. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1910 births Category:1984 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey goaltenders Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay Category:Pittsburgh Pirates (NHL) players
title: Red Spooner
